name: Bloodmagic
description:
Play as a mage that uses their own blood in conjunction with runes to damage foes and destroy crystals.

The game has 4 weapons, 4 items, and three different enemies in randomly created levels.

How Bloodmagic utilizes dual purpose design:

  • Your health is also your ammo
  • You hold space or shift with WASD to aim/use items
  • Weapons also heal you on pickup
  • Destroying the crystal stops monsters from spawning and gives you items

Created in Gamemaker Studio
Sfx from: http://sfbgames.com/chiptone/
Room transitions using https://marketplace.yoyogames.com/assets/2291/transition-system
Music made by John Schmit

Most everything else done by myself, with feedback from friends
